title: Tabular Editor 3 Recent Files
description: Schema for Tabular Editor 3 recent files history. Tracks recently opened scripts, queries, diagrams, pivot grids, and models.
$comment: Version 1.0.0 - Schema location is temporary until schemas repo is available.

RecentFiles.description: List of recently opened file paths (scripts, queries, diagrams, etc.).

items.description: File path to a recently opened file.

PinnedFiles.description: List of pinned file paths that persist at the top of recent files.

RecentModels.description: List of recently opened model paths (.bim, .pbit, .vpax, TMDL folders, etc.).

items.description: Path to a recently opened model.

PinnedModels.description: List of pinned model paths that persist at the top of recent models.
